title: attack lifecycle
extract: The following are the different stages of the attack lifecycle and steps that should be taken to prevent an attack at each stage. 1. Reconnaissance: During the first stage of the attack lifecycle, cyber adversaries carefully plan their method of attack.
extract_html: The following are the different stages of the attack lifecycle and steps that should be taken to prevent an attack at each stage. 1. Reconnaissance: During the first stage of the attack lifecycle, cyber adversaries carefully plan their method of attack.
